Source.Name: gtk-session-lock
Source.Summary: This is a library to use GTK 3 to build screen lockers using the secure ext-session-lock-v1 protocol.
Source.Description: This is a library to use GTK 3 to build screen lockers using the secure ext-session-lock-v1 protocol. This Library is compatible with C, C++ and any language that supports GObject introspection files.

Package.Description: This is a library to use GTK 3 to build screen lockers using the secure ext-session-lock-v1 protocol. This Library is compatible with C, C++ and any language that supports GObject introspection files.
